titles.title: Medicare Diabetic Foot Disease Prevention Amendments of 1987
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B of medicare for therapeutic shoes furnished to individuals with severe diabetic foot disease.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/24/1987--Introduced. Medicare Diabetic Foot Disease Prevention Amendments of 1987 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of the Medicare program for therapeutic shoes furnished to individuals with severe diabetic foot disease.
